entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Flurries beginning in the morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 60%
